Package com.github.kaktushose.jda.commands.dependency

Class DependencyInjector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.kaktushose.jda.commands.dependency.DependencyInjector
  • public class DependencyInjector
extends Object
    Central registry for dependencies and producing methods. Registered dependencies will be injected with the corresponding values if present, else null.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Kaktushose
    See Also:
    Produces, Inject

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DependencyInjector()
      Create a new DependencyInjector.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void index​(@NotNull Class<?> clazz, @NotNull String... packages)
      Scans the whole classpath for methods annotated with Produces.
      void inject()
      Injects all registered dependencies with the corresponding value.
      void registerDependencies​(@NotNull Object instance, @NotNull List<Field> fields)
      Registers fields inside a class as dependencies.
      void registerProvider​(@NotNull Object provider)

    • Constructor Detail

      • DependencyInjector

        public DependencyInjector()
        Create a new DependencyInjector.

    • Method Detail

      • index

        public void index​(@NotNull
                  @NotNull Class<?> clazz,
                  @NotNull
                  @NotNull String... packages)
        Scans the whole classpath for methods annotated with Produces. If found, creates a new instance of the declaring class and will call the method to retrieve the object and register it as a dependency.
        Parameters:
        packages - package(s) to exclusively scan
        clazz - a class of the classpath to scan

      • registerProvider

        public void registerProvider​(@NotNull
                             @NotNull Object provider)
        Takes an instance of a class and scans it for methods annotated with Produces. If found, will call the method to retrieve the object and register it as a dependency.
        Parameters:
        provider - instance of the class to scan

      • registerDependencies

        public void registerDependencies​(@NotNull
                                 @NotNull Object instance,
                                 @NotNull
                                 @NotNull List<Field> fields)
        Registers fields inside a class as dependencies.
        Parameters:
        instance - instance of the declaring class
        fields - the dependencies to register

      • inject

        public void inject()
        Injects all registered dependencies with the corresponding value. If no value is present null gets injected.
